name: Into Another World
description:
(the game requires a RTP package for the rpg maker xp, you can download it there : https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package)

STORY

you are a new employee of the "LWNN TECHNOLOGY CENTER" and it's generally good until you discovered the mysterious machine, turned it on out of curiosity and took you to another world
GAMEPLAY

its jrpg so you explore and fight enemies

CREDITS

Pokem Jagodzinski - Main programist, writer, director

Keiko Tanaka - Composer

Arnold Wright - Second Programer

WE STILL WORKING ON GAME SO THERE CAN BE BUGS AND UNCOMPLETE FUNCTIONS
